text:
The Lienz District () is a district in Tyrol, Austria. It is the only district in East Tyrol. The district borders the Pinzgau (Salzburg) in the north, the districts Spittal an der Drau and Hermagor (both Carinthia) in the east, Veneto (Italy) in the south, and South Tyrol (Italy) in the west.
It has an area of 2,016.41 km². As of 2019, 48,753 people lived there. The administrative center of the district is Lienz.
